   262	    ) -> torch.Tensor:
   263	        # [s, b, c] --> [s, b, head * 3 * head_dim]
   264	        x, _ = self.qkv(x)
   265	
   266	        # [s, b, 3 * head * head_dim] -> 3 * [s, b, head, head_dim]
   267	        q, k, v = self.split_qkv(x)
   268	        batch_size = q.shape[1]
   269	
   270	        q, k, v = (rearrange(x, "s b ... -> b s ...").contiguous()
   271	                   for x in (q, k, v))
   272	        if rotary_pos_emb is not None:
   273	            use_flash_attn = self.attn_backend == _Backend.FLASH_ATTN
   274	            q = apply_rotary_pos_emb_vision(q,

   277	            k = apply_rotary_pos_emb_vision(k,

   285	
   286	            q, k, v = (rearrange(x, "b s ... -> (b s) ...") for x in [q, k, v])
   287	
   288	            max_seqlen = (cu_seqlens[1:] - cu_seqlens[:-1]).max().item()
   289	            output = flash_attn_varlen_func(q,
   290	                                            k,

   292	                                            cu_seqlens_q=cu_seqlens,
   293	                                            cu_seqlens_k=cu_seqlens,
   294	                                            max_seqlen_q=max_seqlen,
   295	                                            max_seqlen_k=max_seqlen,
   296	                                            dropout_p=0,
   297	                                            causal=False)
   298	
   299	            context_layer = rearrange(output,

   301	                                      b=batch_size)
   302	        elif self.attn_backend == _Backend.TORCH_SDPA:
   303	            # Execute attention entry by entry for speed & less VRAM.
   304	            outputs = []

   318	                outputs.append(output_i)
